overview: A couple with a baby decided to live in the mountains, but on their way there it began to rain so the couple decides to seek shelter in a cave, inside the couple meets their fate when a large bat creature attacks and slays them but the baby was spared. One day two farmers were bewildered to see a wild kid running about and decide to bring them to town not knowing what kind of secret the kid holds.
title: Taong Paniki
